mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT contract_period FROM sales_policy WHERE contract_period IS NOT NULL ORDER BY contract_period
SELECT DISTINCT activation_type FROM sales_policy WHERE activation_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY activation_type
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_policy WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name
SELECT DISTINCT plan_name FROM sales_policy WHERE plan_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY plan_name
SELECT DISTINCT activation_type FROM sales_policy WHERE contract_period = #{contractPeriod} ORDER BY activation_type

SELECT plan_name, base_amt, -- 기본료 device_amt, -- 출고가 ROUND((device_amt - official_subsidy) / 24, 0) AS installment_amount, -- 할부금 discount_amt, -- 할인 official_subsidy, -- 공시지원금 ROUND(((device_amt - official_subsidy) / 24) * 0.059, 0) AS installment_interest, -- 할부이자 ROUND( base_amt - IFNULL(discount_amt, 0) - IFNULL(additional_discount_amt, 0) + ROUND((device_amt - official_subsidy) / 24, 0) + ROUND(((device_amt - official_subsidy) / 24) * 0.059, 0), 0 ) AS monthly_bill, -- 월청구요금 additional_discount_amt -- 평생할인프로모션 FROM sales_policy WHERE contract_period = #{contractPeriod} AND activation_type = #{activationType} AND product_name = #{productName} AND plan_name = #{planName} AND sales_policy_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{installmentType}, '%') LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM ( SELECT sales_policy_name, start_datetime, end_datetime, product_name, plan_name, last_updated_datetime FROM sales_policy sp ) AS subquery
SELECT id, sales_policy_name, start_datetime, end_datetime, product_name, plan_name, last_updated_datetime FROM sales_policy sp ORDER BY registered_datetime DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_policy ( sales_policy_name, agency_name, start_datetime, end_datetime, product_code, product_name, is_used_product, plan_name, contract_period, activation_type, subsidy_type, base_amt, discount_amt, additional_discount_amt, device_amt, official_subsidy, agency_subsidy, installment_principal, installment_fee, new_join_commission, moving_commission, change_commission, classification, url_path, mobile_url_path ) VALUES ( #{salesPolicyName}, #{agencyName}, #{startDatetime}, #{endDatetime}, #{productCode}, #{productName}, #{isUsedProduct}, #{planName}, #{contractPeriod}, #{activationType}, #{subsidyType}, #{baseAmt}, #{discountAmt}, #{additionalDiscountAmt}, #{deviceAmt}, #{officialSubsidy}, #{agencySubsidy}, #{installmentPrincipal}, #{installmentFee}, #{newJoinCommission}, #{movingCommission}, #{changeCommission}, #{classification}, #{urlPath}, #{mobileUrlPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, sales_policy_name, agency_name, start_datetime, end_datetime, product_code, product_name, is_used_product, plan_name, contract_period, activation_type, subsidy_type, base_amt, discount_amt, additional_discount_amt, device_amt, official_subsidy, agency_subsidy, installment_principal, installment_fee, new_join_commission, moving_commission, change_commission, classification, url_path, mobile_url_path FROM sales_policy WHERE id = #{id}
